1.title: Does racism affect how you vote?
1.subtitle: Nate Silver has data that answers big questions about race in politics. For instance, in the 2008 presidential race, did Obama's skin color actually keep him from getting votes in some parts of the country? Stats and myths collide in this fascinating talk that ends with a remarkable insight.

1.title: Shy Chy Books
1.subtitle: Shy Chy Books will offer a series of books all about encouraging children to be themselves and embracing their individuality. The first book, I can't, I can't... I CAN! is about a girl who desires to make friends and participate in different activities, but she is held back by her shyness.

2.title: Support the Equal Justice Initiative
2.subtitle: Your contribution is critical to efforts to end mass incarceration and excessive punishment in the United States, challenge racial and economic injustice, and protect the basic human rights for the most vulnerable people in American society.

2.title: Frederick Douglass
2.subtitle: Frederick Douglass was an escaped slave who became a prominent activist, author and public speaker.

3.title: Namascents Candle Co
3.subtitle: Namascents Candle Co crafts candles and home fragrance products for any space; welcoming peace, stillness and good thoughts. Our inspiration is nature, love + memories. We keep it clean + simple with a scentful twist.

3.title: The Get Real Movement
3.subtitle: Get REAL is a Canadian non-profit that combats LGBTQ+ discrimination and promotes acceptance in schools, summer camps, and workplaces. Our merchandise helps fund our work! Every order is shipped with a piece of feedback written by real students across Canada who have participated in one of our workshops

products.name: No Homophobia T-Shirt
products.description: This piece is a statement. It's a statement about what we believe, what we do, and who we are.

products.name: Love is Love Tank
products.description: Love Is Love Is Love Is Love.

products.name: Retro Pride 2018 Tank Top
products.description: This is a print collaboration with artist Emily Deechaleune.

4.title: glAze
4.subtitle: glAze represents those that don't believe it takes much to create an amazing look. We are the stealthy, the un-gawdy, enjoy pale hues and monochromatic splendor yet can switch it up and get really BOLD!

4.title: Free Minds Book Club
4.subtitle: Change lives today. Donate now to support incarcerated and formerly incarcerated youths and adults.

5.title: Shoes by Londo
5.subtitle: Custom painted Vans and Air Force 1s.

products.name: NAURTO V2
products.description: Customs are art so treat them as such. They will last as long as you take good care of them like any other shoe.

products.name: LV DRIP
products.description: Customs are art so treat them as such. They will last as long as you take good care of them like any other shoe.

products.name: BARRY B. AND FRENZ
products.description: Customs are art so treat them as such. They will last as long as you take good care of them like any other shoe.

5.title: Olamina Botanicals
5.subtitle: We are a Black femme-owned apothecary crafting tinctures, teas, syrups and salves in unceded Lenni Lenape territory. Our mission is to help people ground into their own innate power as healers, draw strength from the plant world—and act on behalf of the planet.

products.name: Fire Cider - Immune Tonic
products.description: Fire Cider is a spicy, garlicky, alcohol-free folk immunity remedy that can be taken daily to ward off the sniffles.

products.name: Sore Throat Spray
products.description: Tingle and tickle the microorganisms responsible for your sore throat into oblivion with our Sore Throat Spray.

products.name: Sweet Dreams - Sleep Tonic
products.description: Formulated to help one ease into peaceful slumber, Sweet Dreams features reputed nervine Hops, a sedative that induces deep sleep without headache or groggy feeling upon waking.

6.title: How the Dodgers 'Took' Jackie Robinson | Field of Dreams...Deferred Part 3
6.subtitle: Brooklyn Dodgers executive Branch Rickey signed Jackie Robinson from the Kansas City Monarchs in 1945, but he refused to pay Negro League teams for their players. Watch more on the fight to integrate MLB in "Field of Dreams...Deferred" Part 3.

7.title: The Collective PAC
7.subtitle: The Collective is strengthening our democracy by addressing the significant underrepresentation of the Black community in public office. We are fighting for equal representation and protection under the law so it is vital that we have Black candidates run, and Black voices heard.

7.title: Scent Affairs
7.subtitle: Our goal is to continuously strive to make and provide a quality product. The goal, create a safe, effective, quality product with a long lasting scentual affect.

8.title: Buttaz & Wax
8.subtitle: Buttaz & Wax is a handcrafted body butter and personal care line that came about after founder Keisha Marie made one of her body butters and her eight year old daughter looked up at her and said "mommy these are good, you should sell them".

products.name: Coco Loco Body Butter
products.description: Apply to any area of the body as needed. Best used after a shower when skin is still a bit damp. The butters and oils will lock moisture from shower into your skin.

products.name: Beard Oil
products.description: Work 3-5 drops of our beard oil into your hair revive your beard. Best used right after a shower while your beard is still damp

products.name: Lavender Soap
products.description: Our Lavender handcrafted soap, just like our Lavender bathsalts, smells like calming Lavender.

8.title: Robert Tanner Freeman - Bytes of History
8.subtitle: Robert Tanner Freeman was born in Washington DC in 1846. He was the son of slaves who had bought their freedom in the 19th century. Historical records are unclear but they probably adopted the surname Freeman in response to their transition.

9.title: Diva By Cindy
9.subtitle: Diva is for a woman who wants: Beauty, Excellence and Elegance in her hair. "DIVA" stands for: Divine, Inspired, Virtuous and Annointed. Thank you for using Diva by Cindy... the secret to Longer, Healthier Hair.

products.name: Super-Gro Haridress
products.description: Apply to scalp and temples for thinning hair to promote optimal hair growth. It tingles promoting circulation and healthy hair. Contains Shea Butter, Horse Tail, Menthol and Chamomile. Dry, Itchy, Flaky scalp is a thing of the past.

products.name: Leave-In Detangling Conditioner
products.description: The DIVA BY CINDY Leave-In Detangler eliminates dryness, brittleness, and limpness; and is especially good on over processed, dull hair. Penetrates the hair shaft quickly while detangling and adding sheen making it excellent for fine, limp hair and ideal for wraps and roller sets.

products.name: KURL POP Curl Hydration
products.description: This Leave in formula will leave your curls soft, moisturized and bouncy. Great on all curl types, can be used to define curls, twist and reactivate curls.

9.title: Perfect Blue Alchemy
9.subtitle: Perfect Blue Alchemy is handcrafted organic, vegan and natural perfumes, body products and home items made from organic essential oils and organic plant oils.

products.name: Elevate Body Butter
products.description: This isn't your run of the mill basic body butter. Blended here is the magic of raw, unrefined shea butter, coconut oil, babassu and tamanu oils with soothing arrowroot and our Elevate fragrance you know and love. Glow different!

products.name: The Essentials Kit
products.description: Everyone can benefit from essential oils in the home. We offer you The Essentials Kit - a kit of 3 of the most widely used essential oils, organic of course, to use in your home diffuser or oil-capable humidifier, in the shower and bath and more.

products.name: Vestige Cologne
products.description: Vestige is our premier men's fragrance, incorporating a delicious blend of Sandalwood, Pine, Basil, Orange and Fir essential oils. Vestige uplifts, excites and inspires fresh perspective.

10.title: Bailee's Nail Box
10.subtitle: Bailee's Nail Box is a FUN box for girls, created by 11 year old Bailee K. for girls ages 4 - 12 who love all things nails! Bailee's goal was to create memorable boxes filled with different tools for fun nail designs with an extra girly accessory with each box.

products.name: Bailee's Bundle
products.description: Two safe non-toxic polishes - Bailee's Spark & Rose Shimmer. Nail polish ring holder. All natural hand scrub, made by Bailee, that will leave your hands smooth, moisturized and exfoliated.

products.name: Christmas Scrunchie
products.description: We have a variety of different colored Christmas scrunchies! Let us send you one!

products.name: My Beauty Secret is Gratitude
products.description: You've now found the staple t-shirt of your wardrobe. It's made of a thicker, heavier cotton, but it's still soft and comfy. And the double stitching on the neckline and sleeves add more durability to what is sure to be a favorite!

10.title: Daunte's Funeral and future care of Daunte Jr.
10.subtitle: Please donate to give Daunte Wright the proper burial he deserves and to help his son and son's mother Chyna. And if you can't support financially, please send lots of prayers for the family to get through this tragic loss.

11.title: Intersectionality Matters! Podcast
11.subtitle: Intersectionality Matters! is a podcast hosted by Kimberlé Crenshaw, an American civil rights advocate and a leading scholar of critical race theory.

11.title: Taste by Dannie K
11.subtitle: Taste by Dannie K is a black-owned lingerie company dedicated to the empowerment of women of all shades and sizes. It is our mission to help women realize that they are powerful beyond measure & that they don't have to tone down their super power of sexy to be taken seriously.

12.title: American Civil Liberties Union
12.subtitle: Donate to the ACLU. The ACLU has been at the center of nearly every major civil liberties battle in the U.S. for over 100 years. This vital work depends on the support of ACLU members in all 50 states and beyond.

12.title: Post 21
12.subtitle: Post 21 was created by a Mother-Daughter duo who wanted a comprehensive marketplace that focused on products from Black-owned businesses. They felt strongly that there’s no reason why these products are consistently being discovered when they should be household names. So, they said let’s create the place we want to shop.

products.name: Ball is Life Dog Tag
products.description: Super cool, fun, and durable Pet ID Tags. There's a tag for you and your pet's personality! Comes with custom engraving, to make sure that your little one is never lost and can always find it's way home.

products.name: B is for Black Boy
products.description: B is for Black Boy was written to celebrate the awe-inspiring nature of the Black male. It speaks life into our Black boys and empowers them to manifest their highest potential. It's intended to author and assert positive representation of Black boys to all audiences.

products.name: Headband
products.description: Handmade upcycled padded headband, with satin ribbon on underside next to hair.

13.title: Koils by Nature
13.subtitle: It's the mission of Koils by Nature to provide beauty products, with highest quality plant-based ingredients, excellent customer service, and an educating, empowering, engaging our online community.

products.name: Ultimate Beard Kit
products.description: The Koils by Nature Beard Kit is an all-natural and certified vegan line of skin and hair care products developed exclusively for men. Gentle enough to use every day, and infused with soft, fresh scents, the kit includes the dual-action beard and face cleanser and shaving foam, a moisturizer, beard butter, and oil. When used regularly, each item works together to give your skin the moisture and healing it needs, so your beard can thrive - and look good as it grows. If you’ve experienced a dry, patchy beard, or are ready to finally see those pesky razor bump scars go away, we’ve got you!

products.name: Nourishing Hair and Body Butter Marvelous Mango
products.description: Nourishing Hair & Body Butter is made from the best butters & oils nature provides, it will moisturize, revitalize, heal, and protect your hair and skin. The lightly scented fresh mango scent will have you thinking of a tropical island! This butter smells delightful, please do not ingest, for external use only.

products.name: Sage & Lemongrass Collection
products.description: Moisturized hair is healthy hair. When your natural hair is dry, it's frustrating and feels like a problem you'll never solve. Our Sage & Lemongrass Collection offers the hydration your dehydrated curls need.

13.title: Ka'oir Fitness
13.subtitle: Ka'oir Fitness, founded in 2011 by celebrity Keyshia Ka'oir is a fitness line of patented, trademarked fat burners to help people lose weight faster than ever.

products.name: Ka'oir Waist Eraser™
products.description: Ka'oir Waist Eraser™ will have your waist, stomach & back looking amazing. This is a unisex fitness product which burns belly & back fat, sheds excess water and shrinks waist size....all while allowing your abs to be more visible. It allows you to spot train your stomach, back  & waist.

products.name: Ka'oir Body Sweat™
products.description: The Ka'oir Body Sweat is a state of the art "sweat" suit. It is very stretchy, flexible & comfortable for any workout. KA'OIR Body Sweat will make you sweat tremendously, your metabolism will increase, you will burn calories, lose weight & shed water!

products.name: Ka'oir Slimming Tea
products.description: KA’OIR Slimming Tea is a loose leaf tea packed in individual nylon tea bags that contains a powerful blend of natural ingredients to help slim your body! Each package includes 14 bags (78.4 grams) of detox tea, and is meant to be used every day or every other day.

14.title: NSPRE Electronics
14.subtitle: The NSPRE™ brand is built on and strives for creativity and culture. We create exciting, lifestyle, and innovative products that inspire everyday use. Our vision is to "Inspire the culture through social technology" to improve others' lifestyles and the way we access the world around us.

products.name: Lynx Bluetooth® Sunglasses
products.description: No earplugs or ear coverings. Open concept sound with privacy. Designed with Ultra Modern materials and a lightweight frame design. Connects to any mobile device with Bluetooth® ability.

products.name: NX Pro Plus LE (128G)
products.description: The (Limited Edition) NSPRE™ NX Pro Plus Cotton Candy is an extension of the original NX Pro. It is 6.5 Inches, has a much slimmer frame of 8.0mm, and 3D curved glass back finish.

products.name: NSPRE™ MicroSDHC - 128GB
products.description: Record and transfer videos, photos, music, files and more from Micro SD enabled host devices such as Android smartphones and tablets, action and surveillance cameras, drones, computers and more.

14.title: Automotive Heroes of Black History Month
14.subtitle: Ever wonder what driving would be like without turn signals or traffic lights? Well, without these great inventors, engineers, scientists, and pioneers of their field, driving wouldn’t be what it is today! In celebration of Black History Month, we want to share a few of their exciting stories with you.

15.title: White Privilege: Unpacking the Invisible Knapsack
15.subtitle: As a white person, I realized I had been taught about racism as something that puts others at a disadvantage, but had been taught not to see one of its corollary aspects, white privilege, which puts me at an advantage.

15.title: Omalicha Naturals
15.subtitle: Omalicha translates to beautiful in our native language of Igbo. We handcraft all natural, clean beauty products for the hair and skin designed to bring ones natural beauty to the forefront.

products.name: Sweet Marula Replenishing Facial Serum
products.description: Our Sweet Marula Replenishing Facial serum is a blend of light oils and botanical extracts. This meticulous blend soothes and moisturizes the skin after cleansing, easily penetrating the skin revealing an instant glow.

products.name: Lavender Cucumber Bliss facial toner
products.description: Our Lavender Cucumber Bliss facial toner soothes and restores balance to the skin. Its non-alcoholic astringent fights breakouts without drying the skin.

products.name: Avocado Mango Deep Treatment Mask
products.description: Our Avocado Mango Deep Treatment Mask is a thick, creamy deep conditioner fortified with luscious oils, botanical extracts and soft butters. It is used after cleansing the hair to impart moisture and elasticity back into your strands.

16.title: Just Mercy: A Story of Justice and Redemption
16.subtitle: An unforgettable true story about the potential for mercy to redeem us, and a clarion call to end mass incarceration in America — from one of the most inspiring lawyers of our time.

16.title: Be A Good Person
16.subtitle: Instead of supporting the current trends of negativity, our #1 goal is to remind us all to approach our days with an optimistic, positive, and refreshed outlook. We believe that positive change truly starts with within ourselves, one person at a time.

products.name: Black Color Spectrum Shirt
products.description: Fashion fit, soft feel. Water based ink screen print. BAGP hem tag. Straight cut bottom

products.name: Reflective Core Bodysuit
products.description: One Piece bodysuit but versatile enough to be utilized as a swimsuit.

products.name: Cardinal Snapback Hat
products.description: Cardinal Snapback BE A GOOD PERSON Hat

17.title: Good Thoughts Tea Co
17.subtitle: We are an all natural loose leaf tea company that is centered around the healing properties of herbs. Our main goal is to help heal from the inside out all while reawakening the conversation and experience of tea. Started in 2014 by Ebone’ McCloud, we are located in and operate from Chicago.

products.name: Cinammon Chai
products.description: Cinnamon Chai is our take on the classic chai blend. Benefits: aids digestion, promotes a peace of mind, antioxidant support.

products.name: Half Rising
products.description: Half Rising is a beautifully aromatic cup of oolong tea mixed with kaffir lime leaves and other sweet surprises. Benefits: aids in relieving stress, improves mental health, promotes healthy skin.

products.name: Tea Spoon Set
products.description: These delightful beauties are great for the perfect scoops of our loose leaf tea blends. With each set comes two sizes.

17.title: National Bail Out
17.subtitle: National Bail Out is a Black-led and Black-centered collective of abolitionist organizers, lawyers and activists building a community-based movement to support our folks and end systems of pretrial detention and ultimately mass incarceration. We are people who have been impacted by cages — either by being in them ourselves or witnessing our families and loved ones be encaged. We are queer, trans, young, elder, and immigrant.

18.title: Timeline of investigation into Tyre Nichols' death should be the "blueprint"
18.subtitle: Civil rights attorney Ben Crump says the investigation and action Memphis took in the wake of the death of Tyre Nichols should be how all cases involving police brutality are handled.

18.title: Doe Wiz Apparel
18.subtitle: Doe Wiz apparel was found by Kamar Doe Wiz Lewis. The term Doe came about from the street meaning "Money," and the term "Wiz" short for wisdom. By combining the two terms, we have the name "Doe Wiz" which means "A smart way to get money."

products.name: DWA Cream or White Hoodie
products.description: Casual spot pullover hoodie - loose fit. Choosing this stylish pull over hoodie will add comfort good for exercise, fitness, workout, running, jogging, sportswear etc.

products.name: DWA Grape Purple Yellow Cropped Top Set
products.description: Casual sport sweat suit round neck pullover top long pants, loose fit. Choosing this stylish two-piece suit will make you more attractive. Suit casual, exercise, fitness, workout, running, jogging, sportswear etc.

products.name: DWA Varsity Set Red
products.description: Snap closure. Contrast sleeves. Knitted collar, cuffs and waistband with stripe details. Press-stud closure. Contrast studs. Hidden ear phone loops.

19.title: Constance Baker Motley: Judiciary’s Unsung Rights Hero
19.subtitle: Constance Baker Motley was an unlikely civil rights hero. An African American who grew up near Yale University, she did not personally experience overt racism until late in high school, and as a young person she was almost totally unaware of black history.

19.title: Legends profile: Michael Jordan
19.subtitle: By acclamation, Michael Jordan is the greatest basketball player of all time. Although, a summary of his basketball career and influence on the game inevitably fails to do it justice, as a phenomenal athlete with a unique combination of fundamental soundness, grace, speed, power, artistry, improvisational ability and an unquenchable competitive desire, Jordan single-handedly redefined the NBA superstar.

20.title: Learn about Julius Jones
20.subtitle: Learn about Julius’ life and what led to his wrongful conviction through Viola Davis' docu-series "The Last Defense."

20.title: AuxGod
20.subtitle: AUXGOD is a music battle card game that Rousseau created six months after quitting his job. Players dance, sing, and argue over yesterday’s classics and today’s hits. You’ll never have a wack party again!

products.name: AuxGod: Hip Hop + RNB
products.description: Bring the intensity that Drake brought to Meek Mill at your next party. The pack contains over 100 Hip Hop & RNB cards + 15 bonus cards; Pop, Rock & Country.

products.name: AuxGod: Pop Music Edition
products.description: The pack contains over 100 Pop Music cards + 15 bonus cards; Hip Hop & RNB, Rock & Country. Your favorites are all here from the Backstreet Boys to Rihanna! Thousands of song options to play in response to our cards so, What You Waiting For?

products.name: AuxGod: Country Music Edition
products.description: The pack contains over 100 Country Music cards + 15 bonus cards; Hip Hop & RNB, Rock & POP. Your favorites are all here from Garth Brooks to Luke Bryan. Thousands of song options to play in response to our cards so, are we gonna do this or what?

21.title: Two more cis Black women banned from Olympics for their natural testosterone levels
21.subtitle: Christine Mboma and Beatrice Masilingi are the latest accomplished athletes to be excluded under the rule that devastated Caster Semenya's career.

21.title: Microaggressions Are A Big Deal: How To Talk Them Out And When To Walk Away
21.subtitle: Microaggressions are defined as the everyday, subtle, intentional — and oftentimes unintentional — interactions or behaviors that communicate some sort of bias toward historically marginalized groups. Learn more in this podcast from NPR.

22.title: Sienna Sauce
22.subtitle: The award winning Sienna Sauce comes in 3 delicious flavors for every palette. Tangy (the original flavor), Lemon Pepper and Spicy. The Lemon Pepper and Spicy flavors are made with the original flavor being the base of those Sauces. Sienna Sauce has WOWed so many customers, the family based company had to create a subscription program so the Sienna Sauce addicts wouldn’t run out of their favorite sauces.

products.name: Sienna Sauce Variety Pack
products.description: This gourmet sauce has No High Fructose Corn Syrup and is Gluten-Free. It combines the perfect blend of sweet with a hint of tangy serving as a perfect complement to chicken, pork, beef, or seafood that has been fried, smoked, baked, or grilled.

products.name: Sienna Sauce 3 Pack
products.description: This gourmet sauce has No High Fructose Corn Syrup and is Gluten-Free. It combines the perfect blend of sweet with a hint of tangy serving as a perfect complement to chicken, pork, beef, or seafood that has been fried, smoked, baked, or grilled.

products.name: Digital Sauce Lovers E-Book
products.description: Sienna Sauce has released its first e-cookbook! This digital flavor manual has 4 amazing recipes by celebrity chef, Jabril Riddick, Along with the champion recipe from Sienna Sauce's Virtual Cook-Off.

22.title: Adwoa Beauty
22.subtitle: Adwoa beauty is a modern, non toxic, gender neutral beauty brand catering to multi-cultural hair textures. Buying hair products is a choice, not a command. We empathize with your experience in using tons of products that failed to deliver the results. We've created a highly effective collection of products with ingredients that are concentrated, working with nature and science to bring you immediate results. We are committed to being transparent with our ingredients.

products.name: baomint moisturizing curl defining cream
products.description: it’s your lucky day! our baomint moisturizing curl defining cream will be your new favorite styler. imagine a thick + creamy + rich cream that will leave your strands shiny, silky, and smooth just the way you like it.

products.name: baomint protect + shine oil blend
products.description: this eclectic mix of 15+ natural oils work together in balanced proportions to aid growth and add shine + strength to your hair. we’ve selected high-quality oils for absorption into the hair strands to penetrate from the inside out

products.name: be kinky sweatshirt
products.description: our very soft "be kinky" sweatshirt is a classic with our logo on the back.

23.title: Why Seeing Yourself Represented on Screen Is So Important
23.subtitle: "Black Panther" has been hailed as a model success story for depicting diversity on screen. According to past research, the representation of minority groups in mass media has a powerful educational impact on audiences.

23.title: The Sentencing Project
23.subtitle: The Sentencing Project promotes effective and humane responses to crime that minimize imprisonment and criminalization of youth and adults by promoting racial, ethnic, economic, and gender justice.

24.title: How we're honoring people overlooked by history
24.subtitle: Since its founding in 1851, the "New York Times" has published thousands of obituaries — for heads of state, famous celebrities, even the inventor of the sock puppet. But only a small percentage of them chronicle the lives of women and people of color. In this insightful talk, "Times" editor Amy Padnani shares the story behind "Overlooked," the project she's leading to recognize people from history whose deaths were ignored — and refocus society's lens on who is considered important.

24.title: What it takes to be racially literate
24.subtitle: Over the last year, Priya Vulchi and Winona Guo traveled to all 50 US states, collecting personal stories about race and intersectionality. Now they're on a mission to equip every American with the tools to understand, navigate and improve a world structured by racial division.

25.title: Justice for Tete Gulley
25.subtitle: Tete Gulley was a 31 year old queer Black transient. She was also known by some of her family as Otis. She was found hanging from a tree on the evening of May 27th 2019 in Rocky Butte Park. The cause of death was determined to be suicide at the scene but there is evidence of foul play.

25.title: Ruth Nathan's
25.subtitle: It is Nicole R. Brown's desire that Ruth Nathan’s does not only make customers look spectacular but feel spectacular as well, positively influencing them to feel better about themselves. It is a known fact that when one dresses well, one feels better—and from an outfit that is well put together, that makes one walk with pride, the Urban Peacock emerges.

products.name: Blue Curved Mask
products.description: Still want to look dapper while protecting yourself and others? We have the answer! Reusable and re-washable, these fabric masks will keep you looking good and doing good. When you buy a curved face mask from Ruth Nathan’s we donate a rectangular face mask to health care professionals and essential workers in need.

products.name: Franc Bleu Bow Tie
products.description: The deep older brother of the Franc Un pattern, the Franc Bleu’s watercolor pen lines convey elegance and a truly historic sense of style. Also inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Bleu carries notes of art deco, dancing under the stars, and midnight.

products.name: Franc Un Pocket Square
products.description: Inspired by French Polynesian currency, the Franc Un pattern gives off a refined yet playful vibe sure to elevate your look during formal occasions. Perfect for when you want to be taken seriously—but not too seriously. Notes of Art Deco, French Quarter jazz, and pistachios.

26.title: The police who killed Tyre Nichols were Black. But they might still have been driven by racism
26.subtitle: CNN's Van Jones puts his thoughts to paper in this opinion piece in the role racism played in the killing of Tyre Nichols at the hands of 5 Black police officers in Memphis.

26.title: The New Jim Crow
26.subtitle: The New Jim Crow is a stunning account of the rebirth of a caste-like system in the United States, one that has resulted in millions of African Americans locked behind bars and then relegated to a permanent second-class status—denied the very rights supposedly won in the Civil Rights Movement.

27.title: Grace X Originals LLC
27.subtitle: Grace X Originals is a "Slow Fashion" Streetwear & Lifestyle Brand. We take our time to expertly hand-dye our textiles and apply high-end airbrush artistry to our designs with sustainable fashion practices foremost in mind.

27.title: Negro League Baseball
27.subtitle: Negro League Baseball got its start thanks to the increasing popularity of two things after the Civil War: baseball and segregation.

28.title: Grace & Styles Boutique
28.subtitle: Grace & Styles Boutique is a provider of quality leather handbags and must-have accessories.  We provide a variety of colors and trendy styles at affordable prices to suite everyone!

products.name: Clear handbag in blue and black
products.description: Made with PVC clear outside shell and vegan leather.  Interior pounch is made with faux snakeskin print and pebbled texture.   Comes with adjustable shoulder strap that extends to 52 inches.

products.name: Ellie Leather Tote Handbag
products.description: The “Ellie” brings real elegance and style with an accentuated flower and metallic color.  Tote has a curvy top that gives even more style.

products.name: Men business genuine leather backpack
products.description: Men carry all backpack style business bag. Made with genuine leather. Show up to your meeting in style.

28.title: How colorism shapes our standards of beauty
28.subtitle: When Chika Okoro read the casting call for one of her favorite films, she noticed that actresses with darker skin were assigned lesser roles — prompting her to address a phenomenon she'd experienced all her life: colorism. In this eye-opening talk, Okoro shares coping strategies along with steps that could help eliminate this insidious and destructive mindset of discrimination.

29.title: Remembering Henry Lewis, first Black conductor of a major symphony orchestra
29.subtitle: Henry Lewis’ love and passion for music and symphony was indescribable.

29.title: Gentleman AF
29.subtitle: Gentleman AF is a beard care line featuring a beard wash, beard oils, and beard balms for classy men with a dash of savagery.

products.name: Beard Balms
products.description: Scoop a dime sized amount of beard balm with your finger and place it in the palm of your hands. Rub it between both palms until it melts. Apply it to your beard, comb it down and style as desired.

products.name: Beard Wash
products.description: Wet your face and neck, place a small amount of beard wash in the palm of your hands and massage it into your beard and face, including your neck. Rinse your beard thoroughly.

products.name: Beard Oils
products.description: Shake well before use. Drop a dime sized amount of beard oil in the palm of your hands. Rub your hands and apply the oil from your skin to the tip of your beard.

30.title: 26 King Wavy Merch, LLC
30.subtitle: All of our quality brushes are great brushes! They aren't just great for 360 waves. They, too, promote healthy hair in men, women and children, as well as healthy beards.

products.name: Premium Long Handle Brush
products.description: Medium-Hard Brush. This brush is made with nylon bristles and is great for waves, wolfing and natural hair.

products.name: Baby Blue Compression Cap
products.description: Our 2-6 King Wavy Wave Cap is designed to give the ultimate compression. Combined with any of our durags to achieve your maximum 360, 540, 720 wave potential.

products.name: Navy Blue Silk Durag
products.description: Designer Silk Durag

30.title: Open a random campaign to donate to
30.subtitle: Take the effort of decision out of it — tap here and we'll select a random campaign for you to support!

31.title: 3 ways to speak English
31.subtitle: Jamila Lyiscott is a "tri-tongued orator" in her powerful spoken-word essay "Broken English," she celebrates — and challenges — the three distinct flavors of English she speaks with her friends, in the classroom and with her parents. As she explores the complicated history and present-day identity that each language represents, she unpacks what it means to be "articulate."

31.title: Puzzle Huddle
31.subtitle: Kids grow up fast! Stay connected and hear about new puzzle designs and discounts. We promise not to spam you because we're too busy with potty training and coloring books.

products.name: XL Chemistry Girl Kids' Puzzle
products.description: The XL Chemistry Girls' Puzzle was created to inspire and affirm children using a creative format. This puzzle measures 14n x 19.5in, includes 100 pieces, and is constructed from sturdy cardboard similar to most puzzles sold in stores. Depending on a child’s fine motor skills, the puzzle can be ideal toddlers or young children.

products.name: Future President - Oval Office
products.description: The Future President - Oval Office Puzzle measures 12in x 16.5in, includes 54 pieces, and is constructed from sturdy cardboard similar to most puzzles sold in stores. Depending on a child’s development and fine motor skills, this puzzle can be ideal toddlers or young children.
